    port: 5432
    name: myapp_prod
    credentials:
        username: admin
        password: secret123

    host: localhost
    port: 6379

llm_edit.old_text:

    password: secret123
llm_edit.new_text:

  host: localhost
  port: 5432

    password: secret123
